smg.text: Cold. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist. Light rain later. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
